### [Inspecting an Array](/documentation/DriverKit/OSArrayGetCount#Inspecting-an-Array)

[`getCount`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/getcount)Returns count of members in array.[`getCapacity`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/getcapacity)Returns count of currently allocated capacity for members in array.[`ensureCapacity`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/ensurecapacity)Allocates capacity for members in array.
